misc: His usual shot shape could be described as a "power draw".
biography: Jussi, a familiar face from St. Laurence Golf, brings his experience to the Hector Trophée. Known for his powerful draw, Jussi has a reputation for strategically navigating the course.

With four past appearances at the Hector Trophée, Jussi has demonstrated commitment to this tournament. While the coveted Hector Trophée and the individual Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, his consistent presence underscores his dedication to the sport and this event.

Although Jussi is not currently slated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, golf enthusiasts know that the world of competitive sports can often surprise us with last-minute changes. We will eagerly await any updates regarding Jussi's potential involvement.
Those who know Jussi personally will attest to his meticulous preparation and unwavering focus, traits that make him a formidable competitor in every match he undertakes.
